text:
The Brief from Brussels: Poland, Justice, Amazon
05 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Stefan Grobe



In this issue of The Brief from Brussels: Heavy Defeat of the Polish Government in the European Court of Justice. The Luxembourg judges declare parts of the controversial judicial reform to be non-compliant with EU law.
And: protests of natives from the Amazon region in Brussels. They accuse Europe and the Brazilian government of exploiting nature and destroying their livelihoods.
